title: Obulis
notes: Game progress is saved to ~/.steam/steamapps/common/Obulis/config.dat file.
specs: Core2 Duo E8200 / GeForce GTX 750 Ti

title: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes: Launcher starts fine, when the you click play the fame refuses to launch.

title: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes:
At launch, "Performing first time setup... Installing: VCRedist 2008 (Step 2 of 8)". Error box popup, Title "Microsoft Visual C++ 2005", Message "Error creating process <msiexec /i vcredist.msi /qn /promptrestart>. Reason: File not found." 

Launcher will open after, but attempting to run the game will crash.

title: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
Total War: Rome II - Emperor Edition
notes: Some terrain/shadow glitches, benchmark ~30fps with 'extreme' settings

title: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes: Performance and stability fine. Crashes when starting manual battle from campaign map. The Issue seems to be DXVK-related since it does not occur when running the game on Wine without DXVK.

title: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes: Generally good framerate (~120 fps on benchmark with Ultra preset). Has battery life indicator visible in top center of screen that should have a toggle in Advanced Graphic Options but doesn't. No crashes yet.

title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes: As of Sept 5th 2018 Rome II now seems to work after an update.  If running mods, you may need to edit the preferences.script.txt file to launch the game in windowd mode in order to avoid a black screen at launch. Then go into options and set fullscreen from there.

title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition
notes: Performance and stability fine. Crashes when loading battles on elaborate maps (esp. with many trees). The issue seems to be DXVK-related since it does not occur when running the game on Wine without DXVK. As a workaround lowering the graphics settings prevents these crashes.

title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

notes: When you minimize you get a pretty blank screen. The only solution is open system monitor and kill the process. The game is playable with a good frame rate. Just don't minimize it!!
title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

notes: If you use very high graphic setting you can't enter to battle mod. With lower graphic settings it's work.
title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

notes: The launcher for me that lists  your total war games is just a blank white box. But if you know where the big Play button is you can click in that area and the game starts and works perfectly.
title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.10-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Performance wise the game runs great. I only noticed a few minor graphical issues such as a dirt texture which gets pushed in to the camera when you get too close to the ground in certain locations but nothing game breaking.
title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

notes:
Game runs fine but takes an incredible amount of time to load. 10-15 minutes to get past the loading screen. I cannot find anyone else with this issue however so i appear to be the only one.
Test with 410.66 and 396.54.09 drivers
title: Total War™: ROME II - Emperor Edition

notes: Launcher is a white box. Integrated benchmark crashes. Runs fine otherwise.
